entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
